thread.title: Courgetti with minted cashew pesto
thread.title_full: Courgetti with minted cashew pesto - Telegraph

author: Deliciously Ella
title: Courgetti with minted cashew pesto
text: INGREDIENTS 4 courgettes 150ml olive oil 150g pine nuts 75g cashews 1 ripe avocado 30g mint 3 cloves garlic, crushed Juice of 1½ lemons salt and pepper METHOD Use a spiralizer to make the courgetti. If you don’t have one, use a potato peeler to make strips. Blend the rest of the ingredients together in a food processor. Toss the pesto and courgetti together to serve. More light summer recipes from Deliciously Ella Roasted almond and blueberry salad Ginger, cacao and berry crumble Follow @telegraph
